nodes.title: Add support for per-line open/closing comments.
Added default mapping for Clojure and ClojureScript
Replace ${file_name} with the current file name.
Move standard maven site (d3e554c) into the combined documentation site.
add a readme on dependency enforcement usage
Issue 213 - do not corrupt XML files
license policy enforcement with maven project implementation.
Switch default provided license to ${year} to allow an easiest customization of the year
Add POM project org name and url properties
Update to more recent maven dependencies
[docType] Use slashstar for groovy, kotlin, and scala as proper usage
Use canonical base directories to fix #138.
Bring in a number of default ignores / remove one that was duplicated
Add additional known document types: SCSS, WSDL, XSTL
[pom] Make project look into .m2/cache for mycila-pom as not part of this project
Java 8 and Linux/macos/Windows targets for Travis
minor: default error message should contain the quick fix that works in ~99% cases
ensure exclusions win over inclusions for scanning
Make sure multi-license parameters are correctly set by Maven
License Sets feature - allows one execution to check different licenses
Update default excludes for further CIs
Add missing included licenses to README.md
Plugin configuration to support multi-licensing scenarios
Allow include and exclude paths to be overridden with user properties
use trusty distribution for building on travis
added provider of author name and email address obtained from first commit
Fix #143: Add ability to override a default exclusion to include a pattern from the latter
Track the year of a file creation through license-maven-plugin-git
Track the year of a file creation through license-maven-plugin-git
Remove FreeBSD blurb from the BSD 2-clause license
fix: Use at least a single thread for the checks
When a multi-line inlineHeader is provided, remove indenting
add JAVAPKG_STYLE to supplant JAVADOC_STYLE, don’t bind by default
Use SLASHSTAR instead of JAVADOC for Java
Changed the double tab to one tab
Consolidate .gitignore entries in the top level .gitignore file
Fix the javadoc text to match the actual code
fixes #30 one line comment detected as header are skipped
fixes #71 allow to skip multiple consecutive lines
fixes #70, temporary correction that makes tests to pass even under windows
this closes #68 by excluding by default netbeans configuration file
Revert "Added license EPL 1 and property for project.organization.name"
Add UNLICENSE list entry in website documentation
Fix the links pointing to the repository
Added license EPL 1 and property for project.organization.name
Fix issue #54 Copyright years based on git history
